sentences.en: "To tell you the truth", said the centipede, "I do not manage them at all.
sentences.cn: “说实话，”蜈蚣说，“我根本就不打理它们。”
一只蜈蚣飞快地爬开了.

sentences.en: A huge , hairy, scary centipede was crawling up Master Lianchi's sleeve.
sentences.cn: 一只很大的 、 足的 、 怕的蜈蚣正爬在莲池大师的袖子上.

sentences.en: Any of several arthropods such as the centipede or millipede having segmented bodies one pair of antennae and at least nine pairs of legs.
sentences.cn: 多足纲的节肢动物几种节肢动物的任一种，如蜈蚣或千足虫，长有分节的身体、一对触角和至少九对足。

sentences.en: Centipede bite yesterday was a dream, scared to death!
sentences.cn: 昨天梦见被蜈蚣咬了, 吓死了!

sentences.en: Hold your centipede gently in your hand and examine the end of its tail.
sentences.cn: 您轻轻按住蜈蚣，在你的手和审查结束它的尾巴。

sentences.en: I heard the cock to the centipede, and even went into hiding.
sentences.cn: 蜈蚣听说公鸡来了, 竟然躲了起来.

sentences.en: If you lift up a heavy rock, you may find a centipede living under it.
sentences.cn: 如果你举起一块大石，可能会发现底下有蜈蚣。

sentences.en: In the more humid areas, water centipede is a dominant plant growth.
sentences.cn: 在较湿润地区, 水蜈蚣属植物生长占优.

sentences.en: Instinctively, he pushed off the centipede.
sentences.cn: 本能地, 他拂去那一只蜈蚣.

sentences.en: It is very dangerous to be bitten by a centipede , let alone one so big!
sentences.cn: 被蜈蚣咬到非常危险的, 更何况这么大只的!

sentences.en: Just like tarantula it's killing, the centipede has two curved, hollow fangs, which inject paralyzing venom.
sentences.cn: 和狼蛛的猎杀方法一样, 蜈蚣有一对弯曲 、 中空 、 能注射毒液使猎物马上瘫痪的毒牙.

sentences.en: On this day, the centipede out of play, did not expect close to cock it quietly, suddenly discovered the centipede rooster, rapid escape, but was too late.
sentences.cn: 公鸡干着急。这一天，蜈蚣出来玩耍，没想到公鸡悄悄地接近了它，蜈蚣突然发现了公鸡，快速逃跑，可是已经来不及了。

sentences.en: Remember ! Don't play with a centipede even if it looks dead.
sentences.cn: 那时候我看到一只蜈蚣被人家打扁了,只剩下头还没扁,我认为它已经死了.

sentences.en: The 50 or so players generally poor compared to brushcentipede centipede is to make money.
sentences.cn: 而50左右的玩家一般比较穷,去刷蜈蚣都是为了蜈蚣赚钱的.

sentences.en: The creature is a tiny centipede, just 10 millimeters long.
sentences.cn: 那个生物是一只很小的蜈蚣，只有10毫米长。

sentences.en: There was once a one-legged dragon who said to the centipede, "How do you manage all those legs?
sentences.cn: 从前有一条独脚龙，它对蜈蚣说：“这么多腿你管得过来吗？

sentences.en: You are now a poisonous centipede.

trans.tran_en: a small creature like a  worm  with a lot of very small legs
